content: cute peekaboo cat in a present pattern this pattern is a great decoration or gift for the holiday season but can still be used all year round this pattern is very easy to do and other than the facial features does not require any sewing all you need is approx 90 minutes and a few materials this pattern is completely free on my website 1 if you would like a detailed and printable pdf you can purchase this for immediate download on etsy 2 this adorable kitty is 8cm wide x 10cm long with a 2 5mm hook and 4 ply yarn you can make it larger by changing the hook size and yarn although the pattern uses the colours white red and gold you can use any colour scheme you like this pattern is at easy level and written in us crochet terms you can make as many of these as you like for yourself or as gifts you can sell your product but please credit crochet at midnight in no way can you share reproduce or sell this pattern please respect my rights as a designer gauge 23 stitches by 25 row = 4 inches 10cm abbreviations chain - chain stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet decrease - decrease increase - increase mc - magic_ring slip_stitch - slip_stitch fth - from the hook flo - front loops only blo - back loops only single_crochet increase x2 - complete stitches inside brackets the indicated number of times materials 2 5mm crochet hook approx 15g 4 ply white cotton yarn approx 20g 4 ply red cotton yarn a small amount of gold/yellow yarn stitch marker 2mm eyes black thread 2x 5 ½ x 5 ½ cm cardboard square sewing needle filling scissors 1 http //www crochetatmidnight com 2 https //www etsy com/au/listing/4411271327/peekaboo-cat-in-a-present-crochet ref=related-2&pro=1&dd=1&logging_key=d57ba2512913d111cd43432947cf79525c2ef2dc%3a4411271327
